    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion de la lumière sur d'une surface</string>
            <string language="en">Light reflection from a surface</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Reflexion von einer Oberfläche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão clara de uma superfície</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione chiara da una superficie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά αντανάκλαση από μια επιφάνεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión ligera de una superficie</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre une surface qui a des bosses minuscules qui réfléchissent la lumière dans  toutes les directions.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a surface that has tiny bumps that reflect light in all directions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">surface</string>
            <string language="en">surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Oberfläche, die 
kleine Stösse hat, die Licht in allen Richtungen reflektieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma superfície que 
tenha as colisões minúsculas que refletem a luz em todos os 
sentidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una superficie che ha
urti molto piccoli che riflettono la luce in tutti i sensi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια επιφάνεια που έχει 
τις μικροσκοπικές προσκρούσεις που απεικονίζουν το φως σε όλες τις
κατευθύνσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una superficie que 
tenga topetones minúsculos que reflejen la luz en todas las 
direcciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
